alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 25 at 6:05PM EDT until August 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Eastern Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 605 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to three inches of rain has already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. * Flash flooding will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Lafayette County. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED EXPECTED RAINFALL...3-4 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
